html:
Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_3ooubzc4&referenceId=1_3ooubzc4&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: President Biden is planning to host an in-person meeting with Mexican President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau as soon as next week sources have told Reuters. The in-person summit coincides with policy tensions over energy, trade and immigration. Wall Street's main indexes retreated from record highs on Tuesday as a solid rise in producer prices last month deepened concerns over inflation, while General Electric jumped on its plan to split into three public companies. U.S. Representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez has told the COP 26 summit in Glasgow that the United States has returned to international climate negotiations with a "more just" approach to addressing global warming than it had the last time it was at the table.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3H70M87
